elements.name: question1
elements.title: Why do so many people like the scent of vanilla?
elements.correctAnswer: Because breast milk contains vanilla. Powdered milk also contains vanilla, even more so than breast milk. We were born with vanilla, so to speak.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: How is the room fragrance distributed in the Swissotel Berlin and how much does this type of sales promotion measure cost?
elements.correctAnswer: Via the ventilation system. One container costs 149 euros and lasts one month.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Why does the hotel manager rely on scent marketing?
elements.correctAnswer: To increase customer loyalty. The fragrance should help to create a positive customer experience.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: How does science explain the effect of fragrances on customer behavior?
elements.correctAnswer: Scents are absorbed through the nose and transmitted directly to the centers in the brain that are responsible for feelings/emotions and also for memory. If I perceive a fragrance in a department store with which I associate positive emotions, then I will linger longer in this department store. And consequently consume more, so the thinking goes.
